title: Technique Info - Alabatoso Orbital
heading: Info Tekniki

satellite.heading: Sateliti fɛ
satellite.specs:
A bonya ye milimɛtɛrɛ 50x58x64 ye
1P PocketQube ye
Kisɛya: 245 gr
Fɛn minnu bɛ kɛ: aliminiyɔmu, sanu, fibre de verre ani ɛntɛrinɛti yɔrɔw.
Yɛlɛma: A janya ye bam 525 ± 25 ye; jiginni : SSO 97,6 ± 0,1°
Lanceur : PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) min bɛ baara kɛ ni ISRO ye

antenna.heading: Antɛni/Jɛkulu
antenna.specs:
A bonya: mɛtɛrɛ 6 (a cɛmancɛ) e mɛtɛrɛ 1,2 (janya) .
A girinya ye kilo 46 ye
Fɛn minnu bɛ kɛ : aliminiyɔmu, pankurun min bɛ ni epoyi ye, aliminiyɔmu sanu doni min sirilen bɛ sɛgɛsɛgɛlikɛlan dɔ fɛ.

radio.heading: Arajo ka ɲɛfɔli
radio.specs:
Jiginni-yɔrɔ: 468,5 MHz
Modulation: CSS (CSS) ye
Bandwidth: TBD ye

imageAlt: Sateliti min bɛ wele ko Orbital Temple
